mapper.insert: insert into goodsReceipt (grCode, poCode, grSdate, grCount, grDate, grEcount, grEdate, grOwner, grStatus) values(#{grCode},#{poCode},#{grSdate},#{grCount},#{grDate},#{grEcount},#{grEdate},#{grOwner},#{grStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT gr.grCode, gr.poCode, gr.grCount, gr.grEcount, gr.grDate, gr.grStatus, gr.grEdate, e.empName AS grOwner, po.poCode AS purchaseOrderCode, po.materialName, po.poCount FROM goodsReceipt gr JOIN employees e ON gr.grOwner = e.empid JOIN purchaseOrder po ON gr.poCode = po.poCode WHERE gr.grStatus != '삭제됨' ORDER BY gr.grCode DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from goodsReceipt WHERE grStatus != '삭제됨'

SELECT gr.grCode, gr.poCode, po.poCount, gr.grCount, e.empName AS grOwner, gr.grSdate, gr.grDate, gr.grStatus FROM goodsReceipt gr JOIN employees e ON gr.grOwner = e.empid JOIN purchaseOrder po ON gr.poCode = po.poCode WHERE gr.grCode = #{grCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE goodsReceipt SET grEcount = #{grEcount}, grEdate = #{grEdate}, grStatus = '입고완료' WHERE grCode = #{grCode}

UPDATE material m SET m.materialCount = m.materialCount + (SELECT gr.grEcount FROM goodsReceipt gr JOIN purchaseOrder po ON gr.poCode = po.poCode WHERE gr.grCode = #{grCode}) WHERE m.materialCode = (SELECT po.materialCode FROM goodsReceipt gr JOIN purchaseOrder po ON gr.poCode = po.poCode WHERE gr.grCode = #{grCode})
mapper.select: SELECT poCode FROM purchaseOrder WHERE poCode = (SELECT poCode FROM goodsReceipt WHERE grCode = #{grCode})
